text: ni dang zai yejian de yibufen shijian [hun li he xiao li] zansong ta, zhuming bai hou ye ying zansong ta [ru zhuming bai hou li sheng xing bai, fu gong bai, nian “shu bu ha nan la (zanmei an la chaojue), ai lei ha mu du ling la (yiqie zansong, quan gui an la), an la hu ai ke bai er (an la zhi da)”].
